helio.materialiser.executors

Class ExecutableRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.executors.ExecutableRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>

    public class ExecutableRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    This objects wraps a Rule extending its functionalities, instantiating the Rule with data from the DataSource, generating a set of RDF triples, and storing the generated data in the MaterialiserCache
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExecutableRule(RuleSet ruleSet, DataSource dataSource, java.lang.String dataFragment)
      This method initializes the ExecutableRule with the provided RuleSet, DataSource, and a fragment of data used to instantiate the rules from the RuleSet
      ExecutableRule(RuleSet ruleSet, DataSource dataSource, java.lang.String dataFragment, java.util.List<LinkRule> linkingRules)
      This method initializes the ExecutableRule with the provided RuleSet, DataSource, a set of LinkRule, and a fragment of data used to instantiate the rules from the RuleSet and the LinkRule

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      java.lang.Void call() 
      void generateRDF(java.lang.String subject, Rule rule)
      This method generates the RDF related to the provided Rule, and then updates the MaterialiserCache

        public void generateRDF(java.lang.String subject,
                        Rule rule)
        This method generates the RDF related to the provided Rule, and then updates the MaterialiserCache
